channel.title: Function inmotion : boolean;

item.title: Function inmotion : boolean;
item.dc:creator: @WhiteShadow WhiteShadow
item.description:
@WhiteShadow wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:9, topic:7286”]You could make a function that would check any motion in xs, ys, xe, ye. Then other people could use that and you could use it for this.

You’d use FindColors through a TPointarray and compare them every so milliseconds, if 1 is different, there’s motion. Simple enough.[/quote]

Then when colors dynamically change on the MM, it would result true in motion. xP

Read full topic

item.title: Function inmotion : boolean;
item.dc:creator: @dark_sniper dark_sniper
item.description:
@dark_sniper wrote:

ya these aere simple functions that tell you if your in motion or not… i use this when the flag is out of distance on the mm.

and i main one for the mm and ms.

[code]{.include SRL\SRL.SCAR}

Function InMotionMM : Boolean;
var
area : array [0…4] of Integer;
areax : array [0…4] of Integer;
begin
area[0]:=GetColor(642, 13);
area[1]:=GetColor(576, 84);
area[2]:=GetColor(619, 134);
area[3]:=GetColor(669, 136);
area[4]:=GetColor(719, 74);
wait(100);
areax[0]:=GetColor(642, 13);
areax[1]:=GetColor(576, 84);
areax[2]:=GetColor(619, 134);
areax[3]:=GetColor(669, 136);
areax[4]:=GetColor(719, 74);
if (area[0] = areax[0]) and (area[1] = areax[1]) and (area[2] = areax[2]) and (area[3] = areax[3]) and (area[4] = areax[4]) then begin
Result:= False;
end
else
Result:= True;
end;

Function InMotionMS : Boolean;
var
area : array [0…4] of Integer;
areax : array [0…4] of Integer;
begin
area[0]:=GetColor(33, 25);
area[1]:=GetColor(24, 187);
area[2]:=GetColor(219, 331);
area[3]:=GetColor(493, 198);
area[4]:=GetColor(323, 12);
wait(100);
areax[0]:=GetColor(33, 25);
areax[1]:=GetColor(24, 187);
areax[2]:=GetColor(219, 331);
areax[3]:=GetColor(493, 198);
areax[4]:=GetColor(323, 12);
if (area[0] = areax[0]) and (area[1] = areax[1]) and (area[2] = areax[2]) and (area[3] = areax[3]) and (area[4] = areax[4]) then begin
Result:= False;
end
else
Result:= True;
end;[/code]

Read full topic
